title: Who will get ventilators in a covid-19 crisis?
text: Who will get ventilators in a covid-19 crisis?
If there is a shortage of breathing machines, doctors and ethicists say priority should go to people with the best chance of recovery, reports Alice Klein.
abstract: If there is a shortage of breathing machines, doctors and ethicists say priority should go to people with the best chance of recovery, reports Alice Klein.

similar.title: Drug trials under way.
text: We'll soon know if covid-19 can be treated with drugs developed for HIV and Ebola, reports Alice Klein.
abstract: We'll soon know if covid-19 can be treated with drugs developed for HIV and Ebola, reports Alice Klein.

similar.title: New Zealand's success.
text: The country is tantalisingly close to wiping out covid-19. Does that mean life there can go back to normal? Alice Klein reports.
abstract: The country is tantalisingly close to wiping out covid-19. Does that mean life there can go back to normal? Alice Klein reports.
